amendatorysection.catchline: Sunday horseracing; submission of question; election; manner.
amendatorysection.para: The voters of any county shall have the right to vote on the question of prohibiting or allowing the conducting of racing on Sunday within such county. The question may be submitted at any general state election whenever petitions calling for its submission, signed by at least ten percent of the number of persons voting in the county at the last preceding general state election, are presented to the county clerk or election commissioner not less than thirty days prior to the date of such election. The question shall be placed on the ballot in substantially the following form:

row.entry: BE CONDUCTED IN THE COUNTY OF

amendatorysection.para: A majority of the voters voting on the issue shall determine such issue.
